name: MyInspira
0:
”Alexa, ask my inspira for the nearest urgent care.”
”Alexa, ask my inspira for the wait time at glassboro.”
”Alexa, ask my inspira for when urgent care opens.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my inspira
Developer Terms of Use
des: My Inspira is the Inspira Health Alexa Skill and companion to the My Inspira mobile app feature for locating urgent cares, their hours of operation, and associated wait times. Inspira Health is a charitable nonprofit health care organization that comprises three hospitals, a comprehensive cancer center, several multi-specialty health centers, and more than 150 access points across Southern New Jersey. Inspira makes it easy to get the care you need by using the Alexa skill to locate the nearest Inspira Urgent Care and its associated wait time. To activate this skill simply say “Alexa, (or your device name)”, “Ask My Inspira…where is the nearest urgent care”, or “What is the wait time at…”
